title: I have google pixel 3 xl ... found volume for ring and calling is very low even it got set to 100%
content: Even though sound is set to 100% (for call, ringtone , etc)  call volume and speaker volume is too low.  unable to hear who speaks on other end ... its working good with ear phone.  Please suggest if any settings changes or software update needed... thanks.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
